name: Date Imputation Flag
definition: Day Imputed: Day is imputed.

name: Date Imputation Flag
definition: Month Imputed: Month and day are imputed.

name: Date Imputation Flag
definition: Year Imputed: Entire date (year, month and day) is imputed.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's average value over a defined set of records.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the best possible outcome.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's non-missing baseline observation.
term: Baseline Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the best outcome recorded within a subject.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's previous best-case non-missing value.
term: Best Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A technique that uses assignment logic to duplicate an analysis value to be used in additional evaluations.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to an estimation of a value based on extending a known sequence of values.

name: Derivation Type
synonym: One Half of Lower Limit of Quantification
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to one half of the lower limit of quantification of a test.
term: One Half of Lower Limit of Quantification Derivation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to a function of known values to estimate a value within the range.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the lower limit of detection of a test.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the lower limit of quantification of a test.
term: Lower Limit of Quantification Derivation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's previous non-missing value.
term: Last Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's last recorded non-missing observation.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's last observed value prior to the start of study treatment.
term: Last Value Prior to Dosing Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's maximum value over a defined set of records.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's minimum value over a defined set of records.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the estimate that maximizes the probability of observing what has in fact been observed.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the mean value from a comparator or reference group.
term: Mean of Other Group Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
synonym: Mean Observed Value in a Group
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the mean value observed in a group of subjects.
term: Mean Observed Value in a Group Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A technique that creates a record with a missing analysis value when there is no observed record for a given analysis visit or analysis timepoint.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's next-to-last non-missing value.
term: Penultimate Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's non-missing screening observation.
term: Screening Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the upper limit of detection of a test.
term: Upper Limit of Detection Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the upper limit of quantification of a test.
term: Upper Limit of Quantification Derivation Technique

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the worst possible outcome.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the worst recorded outcome within a subject.

name: Derivation Type
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the subject's worst-case non-missing observation.
term: Worst Observation Carried Forward Imputation Technique

name: Derivation Type
synonym: Worst Observed Value in a Group
definition: A data derivation or imputation technique which sets the analysis value on the record to the worst value observed in a group of subjects.
term: Worst Observed Value in a Group Imputation Technique

name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Version 2 Questionnaire Parameter Code
definition: Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Version 2 - Total score used for analysis.

name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Version 2 Questionnaire Parameter Name
definition: Generalized Anxiety Disorder - 7 Version 2 - Total score used for analysis.

name: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form Questionnaire Parameter Code
definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Total score used for analysis.
term: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Total Score

name: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form Questionnaire Parameter Name
definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Total score used for analysis.
term: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Total Score

name: Parameter Type
definition: Derived: Indicates that a parameter is derived as a function of one or more other parameters.

name: Pool for Integration
definition: The pool that includes data across all studies within which the subject has participated, used for the overall integrated analysis.

name: Subject Trial Status
definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion. (NCI)

name: Subject Trial Status
definition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

name: Subject Trial Status
definition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption. (NCI)

name: Time Imputation Flag
definition: Hours Imputed: Entire time (hours, minutes and seconds) is imputed.

name: Time Imputation Flag
definition: Minutes Imputed: Minutes and seconds are imputed.

name: Time Imputation Flag
definition: Seconds Imputed: Seconds are imputed.
